<style type="text/css">
body,ul,ol,li,p,form,table,td,img,div,dl,dt,dd{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;}
body{color:#666; background:#363636;font-size:12px;font-family: Arial, Helvetica,"宋体";}
ul,ol,li{list-style-type:none;}
li{list-style-type:none;background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/bbs/default/images/libg.gif) no-repeat;line-height:1.5em; padding-left:1em; color:#aaa;}
a:link{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;} 
a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;} 
a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color : #f00 ;} 
a:active{text-decoration : none ;color : #333 ;}
.cle{ clear:both; font-size:0px;}

.top{ height:120px; width:960px; margin:0 auto;}
.con{ width:940px; border:5px solid #d7d7d7;background:#fff; margin:0 auto; padding:5px;}

.flink{ font-size:14px; font-weight:bold;height:60px;text-align: center;}

.logo{ float:left; width:198px; height:79px; margin:31px 0 0 20px; display:inline;}
.login{ float:right; padding:10px 20px 0 0 ; text-align:right;}
.login a:link{text-decoration : none ;color : #FC0 ;} 
.login a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color : #FC0 ;} 
.login a:hover{text-decoration : none ;color : #fc6 ;} 
.login a:active{text-decoration : none ;color : #FC0 ;}
.login_top{color:#ccc; text-align:right; padding-right:10px;}
.login_top a:link{text-decoration : none ;color:#ccc ;} 
.login_top a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color:#ccc ;} 
.login_top a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color:#ccc ;} 
.login_top a:active{text-decoration : none ;color:#ccc ;}
.login_bottom{ padding-top:75px; font-weight:bold;}


.position{ height:18px; padding:8px 20px 0 40px; border-bottom:3px #f6f6f6 double;background:url({$$contextPath$$}/templates/bbs/default/images/position_bg.jpg) no-repeat 10px 8px;}
.pos_left{ float:left;}
.pos_rig{ float:right;}

{$$specialCode1$$}

.footer{ font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center; color:#999; margin-top:10px;}
.footer a:link{text-decoration : none ;color : #C8A866 ;} 
.footer a:visited{text-decoration : none ;color : #C8A866 ;} 
.footer a:hover{text-decoration:underline;color : #C8A866 ;} 
.footer a:active{text-decoration : none ;color : #C8A866 ;}


.mydiv {
background: #fff;border: 2px solid #666;text-align: center;z-index:999;width: 600px;height: 300px;left:50%;top:40%;border-left:2px solid #eee;border-top:2px solid #eee;
margin-left:-300px!important;/*FF IE7 该值为本身宽的一半 */
margin-top:-150px!important;/*FF IE7 该值为本身高的一半*/
margin-top:0px;
position:fixed!important;/* FF IE7*/
position:absolute;/*IE6*/
_top:       expression(eval(document.compatMode &&
            document.compatMode=='CSS1Compat') ?
            documentElement.scrollTop + (document.documentElement.clientHeight-this.offsetHeight)/2 :/*IE6*/
            document.body.scrollTop + (document.body.clientHeight - this.clientHeight)/2);/*IE5 IE5.5*/
}

.bg,.popIframe {
background-color: #666; display:none;width: 100%;height: 100%;left:0;top:0;/*FF IE7*/
filter:alpha(opacity=50);/*IE*/
opacity:0.5;/*FF*/
z-index:1;
position:fixed!important;/*FF IE7*/
position:absolute;/*IE6*/
_top:       expression(eval(document.compatMode &&
            document.compatMode=='CSS1Compat') ?
            documentElement.scrollTop + (document.documentElement.clientHeight-this.offsetHeight)/2 :/*IE6*/
            document.body.scrollTop + (document.body.clientHeight - this.clientHeight)/2);/* www.codefans.net IE5 IE5.5*/
}
.popIframe {
filter:alpha(opacity=0);/*IE*/
opacity:0;/*FF*/
}
.mydiv_top{ background:#3CC; height:30px;}
.mydiv_top_left{ float:left; padding:7px 0 0 20px;}
.mydiv_top_rig{ float:right; padding:7px 10px 0 0;}
.mydiv_input{ width:200px; padding-top:40px;}
.input_name input,.input_pw input,.input_cookie input{ width:120px; height:15px;}
.input_num input{ width:50px; height:18px;}
.input_name{ text-align:left; margin-bottom:10px;}
.input_cookie{ text-align:left; margin-bottom:10px;}
.input_pw{ text-align:left; margin-bottom:10px;}
.input_num{ text-align:left; margin-bottom:10px;}
.input_but{}

</style>
